name: Pokémon Topaz
overview: Pokémon Topaz is really an amazing Pokémon hack that brings new experiences to you. It is a hack of Pokémon Ruby but I am sure you never see these things before. Because you are a new member of TEAM ROCKET and you have missions to destroy the world. You must capture Rare Pokémon and earn as much money as you can for your Gang. GIOVANNI is Team Rocket’s Leader and your boss. He offers you a promotion if you can do things like he requires. Then you fly to SHAWFORD in a helicopter, your Mother hurries you into your house as SHAWFORD is swarming with Pokémon Police. That’s how your game starts.
